Our Product Lines

Two electric cargo trike options designed for farm work and off-road use in Hawaiʻi

View Flagship Model Get Quote

Flagship Cargo Tricycle

Our premium electric cargo trike with maximum power, capacity, and range for demanding farm applications

Maximum Performance & Capacity

1200W Electric Motor

High-torque electric motor provides reliable power for hauling heavy loads and navigating challenging terrain.

72V Battery System

Advanced 72V lithium battery system delivers extended range and consistent performance throughout the workday.

1500lb Cargo Capacity

Heavy-duty steel construction supports up to 1500 pounds of cargo, tools, or produce.

55 Mile Range

Up to 55 miles on a single charge, perfect for extended work sessions without interruption.

Hydraulic Dump Bed

Optional hydraulic dump bed makes unloading cargo effortless - perfect for bulk materials and produce.

Compact Cargo Tricycle

A smaller, more maneuverable option perfect for smaller farms and tighter spaces

Compact & Efficient

48V 500W Electric Motor

Efficient 500W motor provides reliable power while maintaining excellent energy efficiency.

600lb Cargo Capacity

Compact 3.5ft bed with 600-pound capacity - perfect for smaller loads and tighter spaces.

35 Mile Range

Up to 35 miles on a single charge - ideal for daily farm operations and local deliveries.

25 MPH Top Speed

Optimal speed for farm and off-road use - fast enough to be efficient, safe enough for rough terrain.

Compact Design

Smaller footprint makes it perfect for navigating tight spaces and smaller farm operations.

Shared Features

Both models include these essential features for farm work and off-road use

Weather Protection

Optional wind and rain screen with wiper system for comfortable operation in all conditions.

Reinforced Tires

Heavy-duty tires specifically designed for farm and off-road use, built to handle rough terrain.

2-Year Warranty

Comprehensive 2-year parts warranty with local support - we stand behind our work.

Ready to Choose Your Model?

Contact us to learn more about our product lines and find the perfect fit for your farm operations.
